message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.CL. 

The paper deals with image retrieval and pattern spotting, which are tasks related to computer vision and image processing. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves learning a similarity-based representation using a neural network, which falls under the scope of machine learning and deep learning, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) a likely sub-category as well. The use of feature maps and similarity-based matching also suggests that cs.IR (Information Retrieval) could be a relevant sub-category. Additionally, the paper involves experiments and evaluation of the proposed method, which could fall under cs.MM (Multimedia) or cs.CL (Computation and Language).
